text: A boy is standing up trying to get the jar, and the school is falling. The girl is reaching up to get a cookie out of his hand. Mother is at the window washing dishes. The sink is overflowing. I'm getting on her shoes. Sauses, blade on the baby. You want to know what's going on? You want to tell you what's on the sink to everything? Oh, well, that's all I see happening. Plus, I love going.
